lead_paragraph: Zach Johnson has the benefit of twin major boosts going into this week's Masters, the knowledge that he won here in 2007 after holding off Tiger Woods and the added bonus of victory at last year's British Open.

headline.print_headline: Zach Looks for Extra Masters Lift From Claret Jug
headline.main: Zach Looks for Extra Masters Lift From Claret Jug
